head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LAVYNE, LESTER J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LAVYNE, LESTER J.

block.p: LAVYNE--Lester J., on January 20, 2007. Beloved husband of Muriel. Loving father of Dr. Michael H. Lavyne and the late Carol Altomare and father-in-law of Kathy Lavyne. Cherished grandfather of Drew and Erika. Visiting hours Monday 11:30 am-1:30 pm at ''The Riverside'' 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. Interment to follow Cedar Park Cemetery.
